snippet: LEEDS--Dalia. The Board and staff of Lincoln Center Theater are saddened by the death of our beloved Patron Committee member and friend, Dalia Leeds. Dalia was a dedicated champion of LCT, and it was always a special pleasure to have her with us at the Theater. She was a warm and caring person of consummate charm and grace and we will miss her very much. We send our deepest condolences to Dalia's husband Larry, daughters Ashley and Tracy and her entire family. J. Tomilson Hill, Chairman Eric M. Mindich, President Andre Bishop, Producing Artistic Director 1/3
lead_paragraph: LEEDS--Dalia. The Board and staff of Lincoln Center Theater are saddened by the death of our beloved Patron Committee member and friend, Dalia Leeds. Dalia was a dedicated champion of LCT, and it was always a special pleasure to have her with us at the Theater. She was a warm and caring person of consummate charm and grace and we will miss her very much. We send our deepest condolences to Dalia's husband Larry, daughters Ashley and Tracy and her entire family. J. Tomilson Hill, Chairman Eric M. Mindich, President Andre Bishop, Producing Artistic Director 1/3
